(Personal, Relationship, Groupwork; PRG Division for Counselling in Agency and Independent Settings) p. 3 (PRG; Personal, Relationship and Group Division of the British Association for Counselling and Psychotherapy) p. 4 (Personal Relationship and Groupwork Division for Counselling in Agency and Independent Settings)
(Association for Independent Practitioners (AIP), formerly Personal Relationship Groupwork (PRG), is a division of the BACP)
("Personal, Relationship, Groupwork" represented three separate elements)
